description: Sets the channel to send a intros in.
extended: Running the command without providing a channel will disable intros!
RESET: Successfully disabled intros! Members will no longer be able to register.
NO_CHANNEL: You did not provide a valid channel!
SUCCESS: Successfully set the intro channel to `{CHANNEL}`! Introductions will be sent there.
VERY_FUNNY: Very funny... Provide a text channel ðŸ˜‰
